snippet.title: Pocket Pursuit - Trailer iOS Android
snippet.description:
Download free - iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1440738174

Download free - Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.NinjeticStudios.PocketPursuit

The new mobile police chase game, available for Android and iOS devices on the app stores!

Chase down criminals, or try and make your getaway as the police close in. Set worldwide high scores on the leaderboards, and unlock achievements while playing.
